mainText:
You've given me an iPod, iPod mini, iPod Video, iMac, Macbook, Macbook Pro, Airport, Apple TV, Mighty Mouse, iTunes, iPhone, iPhone 3g, iPhone 3gs, iPhone 4, Apps, Games, my first paying job in college as an intern, inspiration, and unforgettable experiences. Thank you for making me who I am today. I wish the best for your family and hope you rest in peace.

With Sincere Gratitude
header: Thank You for Everything Steve Jobs
author: Grant
